channel.title: Posts on Aaron Jones
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aaron Jones

item.title: Home Assistant Security System
item.description: This is part one of a high-level guide that will get you started out with Home Assistant as a basic security system. In part two, I show how to add a dashboard display to your system.

item.title: VPN Server Select
item.description:
This post explains how to set a VPN connection on a home router. I am using a Netgear R6300V2 with DD-WRT.

For DD-WRT, you can check if your router is supported in the Router Database.

item.title: VPN Speed Test
item.description: This script will automate selecting the best VPN server from a given list of servers your provider offers.

item.title: Noobs Term
item.description:
Noobs Term is a terminal bundle that combines a few powerful programs with “sensible” configurations and a beautiful theme.

I made Noobs Term to give people a foundation from which they can begin working with Zsh and Tmux without being overwhelmed with many customizations and options up front. When I first started using Zsh and Tmux, I found many configurations that offered some customization that I liked and some I either didn’t like or didn’t understand.
